basic_information.scholarship_name: The Haulman Cunliff Endowed Scholarship in Bilingual Education/TESOL
basic_information.scholarship_notes: Eligible for full disbursement if graduating in December
basic_information.committee_name: CEPS - Haulman Cunliff Scholarship in TESOL

description: Scholarship Mission: To provide scholarship assistance to graduate students within the College of Education & Professional Studies who are pursuing a Masters of Education Â– Bilingual Education/TESOL. Eligibility Requirements Must be a graduate student in the Bilingual Education/ TESOL program at UCO to apply Preference will be given to classroom teachers that serve English learners in the metropolitan area In a short essay, please share your plan to work for Oklahoma Public Schools after graduation and how this scholarship will help achieve your goal In the same essay, please demonstrate financial need Selection Process Recipients of the scholarship will be selected by a departmental committee Award Requirements Must be enrolled in the upcoming fall and spring semester to receive award Attendance at an awards banquet is required for all recipients Recipients must write a thank you letter to the donors of the scholarship

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
